newsitem.title: USA: Spyglass unveils network Internet filter.
newsitem.headline: Spyglass unveils network Internet filter.

text.p: Spyglass Inc said Tuesday it unveiled a new version of its Surfwatch product, which blocks access from a computer network to objectionable material on the Internet.
The product is an add-on for networks based on the Windows NT Server. Previously, Surfwatch was available on single-user computers only, Spyglass said.

The new version of Surfwatch blocks computers on a network, for example in a business, from accessing on the Internet sexually explicit material and that containing violence, drugs, alcohol, tobacco, and gambling.
The network version of Surfwatch will be available on December 1. The price is $495, which includes a one-year subscription to an updated list of Internet sites containing objectionable material.
